pages.text: aye imaan waalo! bahuth badh gumaaniyo se bacho, yaqeen maano ke baaz badh gumaaniya gunaah hai aur bhedh na tatola karo aur na tum mein se koyi kisi ki ghibath kare, kya tum mein se koyi bhi apne murda bhai ka gosht khaana pasand karta hai? tum ko us se ghin aayegi aur Allah se darte raho, beshak Allah tauba qubool karne waala meherbaan hai

aye logo! hum ne tum sab ko (ek hee) mardh wa aurath se payda kiya hai aur is liye ke tum aapas mein ek dosre ko pehchaano, kumbe aur qabile bana diye hai, Allah ke nazdeek tum sab mein se ba izzath wo hai jo sab se zyaada darne waala hai, yaqeen maano ke Allah daana aur ba qabar hai

dehaati log kehte hai ke hum imaan laaye, aap keh dijiye ke dar haqiqath tum imaan nahi laaye, lekin yo kaho ke hum Islaam laaye (muqaalifath chohd kar muthi ho gaye) halaan ke abhi tak tumhaare dilo mein imaan daakhil hee nahi hoa, tum agar Allah ki aur us ke rasool(sallallahu alaihiwasallam) ki farma bardaari karne lagoge to Allah tumhaare amaal mein se kuch bhi kam na karega, beshak Allah baqshne waala meherbaan hai

momin to wo hai jo Allah par aur us ke rasool par (pakka) imaan laaye, phir shak wa shuba na kare aur apne maalo se aur apni jaano se Allah ki raah mein jihaad karte rahe (apne daawe imaan mein) yahi sacche hai aur raasth go hai
keh dijiye! ke kya tum Allah ko apni deen daari se agaah kar rahe ho, Allah har us cheez se jo asmaano mein aur zameen mein hai, ba qoobi agaah hai aur Allah har cheez ka jaanne waala hai

apne musalmaan hone ka aap par ehsaan jataate hai, aap keh dijiye ke apne musalmaan hone ka ehsaan mujh par na rakho, balke dar asl Allah ka tum par ehsaan hai ke us ne tumhe imaan ki hidaayath ki,agar tum raasth go ho
yaqeen maano ke asmaano aur zameen ki poshida batein Allah qoob jaanta hai aur jo kuch tum kar rahe ho ose Allah qoob dekh raha hai
